announcement callout component

< back to style guide

PROPS:

  • backgroundColor: can be white, gray, dark, primary or secondary (optional, default is white)
  • title (optional)
  • link - button link (optional)
  • cta - button text (optional)
  • link2 - secondary button link (optional)
  • cta2 - secondary button text (optional)
  • alignment - can be left or center (optional - default is center)

SLOTS:

  • description (optional)

White style:
